content:
In SDC here, the validator issues the following warning:
The display "inch (international)" is not a valid display for the code {http://unitsofmeasure.org}[in_i] - should be one of ['[in_i]'] (from http://tx.fhir.org/r4)

However, here, it quite clearly shows that "inch (international)" is definitely the display value for the code "[in_i]".

I've tried wiping the tx cache and it makes no difference
